languages.text: "Я надеял{mf|ся|ась}, что ты прислушаешься к голосу разума. Напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Я надеял{mf|ся|ась}, что ты прислушаешься к голосу разума. Напрасно".

languages.text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."
languages.original_text: "Я надеял{mf|ся|ась}, что ты прислушаешься к голосу разума. Напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "I had hope that you would listen for the voice of reason. I was wrong."
"I had hope that you would listen for the voice of reason. I was wrong."
"I had hope that you would listen for the voice of reason. I was wrong."
"I had hope that you would listen for the voice of reason. I was wrong."
"I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."
"I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

languages.text: «Albergaba la esperanza de que atendiese a razones. Me equivocaba».
languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: «Albergaba la esperanza de que atendiese a razones. Me equivocaba».

languages.text: “我本以为你恢复理智，但我错了。”
languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: “我本以为你会倾听理性的声音，但我错了。”

languages.text: « J'espérais que vous finiriez par entendre raison, mais visiblement, je me trompais. »
languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: « J'espérais que vous finiriez par entendre raison, mais visiblement, je me trompais. »

languages.text: 「お前が理性に耳を傾けてくれると期待していたのだが、間違いだったようだ」
languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が理性に耳を傾けてくれると期待していたのだが、間違いだったようだ」

languages.text: "Ich hatte gehofft, Ihr würdet auf die Stimme der Vernunft hören. Ich habe mich wohl geirrt."
languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte gehofft, Ihr würdet auf die Stimme der Vernunft hören. Ich habe mich wohl geirrt."

languages.original_text: "I had hoped that you would listen to reason. I was wrong."
